item.title: A massive winter storm will hit large parts of the U.S. through the weekend
item.description: A large storm system is expected to hit this weekend, with snow and ice from Texas to the Carolinas and up the Eastern seaboard. The winter system could bring more than a foot of snow.

item.title: House Oversight panel votes to hold Bill and Hillary Clinton in contempt of Congress
item.description: Republicans on the committee have been seeking to question the Clintons as part of a probe into the government's handling of the Jeffrey Epstein case. The vote sends the matter to the full House.
